general_synopsis: High Shannon 1036 expected Malin 1035 by midnight tonight

In south, cyclonic 3 to 5 in south, otherwise easterly 4 to 6, occasionally 7 at first in northeast. In north, easterly 4 to 6.

Weather
In south, fair. In north, mainly fair.
Visibility
In south, good. In north, moderate or good.
